subtitle.subtitle: You'll want my car again, I imagine.
subtitle.translation: You'll want my car again, I imagine.

subtitle.subtitle: [Oliver] You'll be impressed to learn that word of your departure from Wragby
subtitle.translation: [Oliver] You'll be impressed to learn that word of your departure from Wragby

subtitle.subtitle: has made it all the way to my little village in Scotland.
subtitle.translation: has made it all the way to my little village in Scotland.

subtitle.subtitle: A man came to work in the local mines, brought the tale with him,
subtitle.translation: A man came to work in the local mines, brought the tale with him,

subtitle.subtitle: telling everyone in the pub about a lady who fell for a hired man
subtitle.translation: telling everyone in the pub about a lady who fell for a hired man

subtitle.subtitle: and didn't care if the world knew it because… she loved him.
subtitle.translation: and didn't care if the world knew it because… she loved him.

subtitle.subtitle: Names weren't used, of course.
subtitle.translation: Names weren't used, of course.

subtitle.subtitle: I was simply "the gamekeeper."
subtitle.translation: I was simply "the gamekeeper."

subtitle.subtitle: You were the "Lady in love."
subtitle.translation: You were the "Lady in love."

subtitle.subtitle: Excuse me, I'm looking for Oliver Mellors.
subtitle.translation: Excuse me, I'm looking for Oliver Mellors.

subtitle.subtitle: Do you… Do you know him?
subtitle.translation: Do you… Do you know him?

subtitle.subtitle: [man] Oh yes, I do.
subtitle.translation: [man] Oh yes, I do.

subtitle.subtitle: He's down that road.
subtitle.translation: He's down that road.

subtitle.subtitle: Thank you. Thank you so much!
subtitle.translation: Thank you. Thank you so much!

subtitle.subtitle: [Oliver] It was a good story, and I found myself wondering
subtitle.translation: [Oliver] It was a good story, and I found myself wondering

subtitle.subtitle: if there might be more to the tale.
subtitle.translation: if there might be more to the tale.

subtitle.subtitle: A feller I knew from the army got me work at a farm here.
subtitle.translation: A feller I knew from the army got me work at a farm here.

subtitle.subtitle: Thirty shillings a week
subtitle.translation: Thirty shillings a week

subtitle.subtitle: and decent lodgings in a cottage up the road.
subtitle.translation: and decent lodgings in a cottage up the road.

subtitle.subtitle: I thought I needed a purpose
subtitle.translation: I thought I needed a purpose

subtitle.subtitle: before bringing you and a child into my life.
subtitle.translation: before bringing you and a child into my life.

subtitle.subtitle: [Oliver] I can't say I've found any greater meaning here on the farm,
subtitle.translation: [Oliver] I can't say I've found any greater meaning here on the farm,

subtitle.subtitle: but I've made a home.
subtitle.translation: but I've made a home.

subtitle.subtitle: I can't imagine what you've already been through
subtitle.translation: I can't imagine what you've already been through

subtitle.subtitle: and how much you've already given up.
subtitle.translation: and how much you've already given up.

subtitle.subtitle: You'd be giving up even more to come live here with me,
subtitle.translation: You'd be giving up even more to come live here with me,

subtitle.subtitle: but…
subtitle.translation: but…

subtitle.subtitle: Oliver!
subtitle.translation: Oliver!

subtitle.subtitle: [Oliver] …what we have… together
subtitle.translation: [Oliver] …what we have… together

subtitle.subtitle: is different than anything I've ever known.
subtitle.translation: is different than anything I've ever known.

subtitle.subtitle: There's a little flame between us. It's always burning.
subtitle.translation: There's a little flame between us. It's always burning.

subtitle.subtitle: And I've come to believe that tending a fire like that is…
subtitle.translation: And I've come to believe that tending a fire like that is…

subtitle.subtitle: purpose enough for any life.
subtitle.translation: purpose enough for any life.
